A

allDone() - Method in class FlowCtrl
Returns true if all the threads are complete.

D

deriveImage() - Method in class Terrain
Converts height values to greyscale colour and populates an image.
deriveImage() - Method in class Water
Converts depth values in the water grid to shades of blue [extension to assignment], or transparent if the depth is zero, and populates an image.
dim() - Method in class Terrain
Returns the total size of the terrain.
dim() - Method in class Water
Returns the total size of the area.
doWork() - Method in class FlowCtrl
Creates and starts the four threads which run the simulation, and sets the done boolean to false.

F

FlowApp - Class in <Unnamed>
Main application to display the water flow over a terrain.
FlowApp() - Constructor for class FlowApp
 
FlowCtrl - Class in <Unnamed>
A runnable class which activates and controls the flow of water, and updates the time.
FlowCtrl(FlowPanel, TimeText) - Constructor for class FlowCtrl
Creates a FlowCtrl object with the panel and text area to control.
FlowPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
A panel that shows the water and terrain images overlaid on each other.
FlowPanel(Terrain, Water) - Constructor for class FlowPanel
Creates a FlowPanel object with given Terrain and Water objects.
FlowThread - Class in <Unnamed>
A single thread which performs the simulation work on one quarter of the area.
FlowThread(int, Terrain, Water) - Constructor for class FlowThread
Creates the thread using the quarter number, and the Terrain and Water objects.

makeSource(int, int) - Method in class Water

P

Responsible for painting the terrain and water as images.

Sets the stopWork boolean to true to pause the simulation.

R

Resets the Water object and the time text.
reset() - Method in class Water
Resets the Water object by setting all the depths in the grid to zero.
resetRivers() - Method in class FlowPanel
Resets the Water object and repaints the panel.
resetTime() - Method in class TimeText
Resets the time to zero and shows the new time.
run() - Method in class FlowCtrl
Starts the simulation and continues while stopWork is false and only if the previous threads are complete.
run() - Method in class FlowThread
Gets one quarter of the permuted area and runs the water flow simulation over that area.

A text area that shows the number of timesteps since the start of the simulation.

Sets up a new TimeText text area with a time of zero.

U

updateTime() - Method in class TimeText
